usa: Dust Bowl: The Dust Bowl, characterized by severe drought and heat waves in the Great Plains, began.[131]
The Tydings–McDuffie Act was signed into law, establishing the Philippine Commonwealth.<sup id="cite_ref-132" class="reference">[132]</sup>
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission was established.<sup id="cite_ref-133" class="reference">[133]</sup>
The Reciprocal Trade Agreements Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-134" class="reference">[134]</sup>
The Glass–Steagall Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-135" class="reference">[135]</sup>
The Indian Reorganization Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-136" class="reference">[136]</sup>
John Dillinger was killed.<sup id="cite_ref-137" class="reference">[137]</sup>
The Federal Housing Administration was established.<sup id="cite_ref-138" class="reference">[138]</sup>
